Articles.Content:
I emptied browser cache (and also checked the box for "Clear data from hosted apps" just for good measure...I'm using Chrome on a Windows 7 machine); reloaded pages. Still can't see the SSTO device on my Kerbin ribbon, or anyone else's on this thread either.

It does show up on the ribbon generator page itself, both next to the set of Kerbin checkboxes and at the bottom. I hit "Submit"; it takes me to "And done! here is your signature image"...and SSTO is gone.

Oh, thank you, I was able to find out the issue : it only appeared when the Return chevron was selected, thats why I could see it later while I was testing. It should perfectly work now

P.S. Was there supposed to be an option for us to select from different ordering schemes for the ribbons? I didn't see one yet.

I was suppose to do something like that, but I don't think I will have time soon, because in 8 days I'm going away from home for six week and I will not have any access to an internet connection :s

P.P.S. This is a really cool tool and a true public service to the KSP community. Thank you.

Thank you, don't forget to thanks Unistrut for making the ribbons and jfjohnny5 for making the flags too
is it possible to get a copy of the source?
humm... why would you want that?
My account doesn't seem to want me to be able to edit my signature, there's no "edit signature" button anywhere.
While you are logged in, you simply have to open the ribbon generator, your actual ribbons se should then be loaded

My account doesn't seem to want me to be able to edit my signature, there's no "edit signature" button anywhere.

You need a certain number of posts before you're able to edit your signature and/or avatar.
Oh, thanks. How many posts?

It is five minimum. You now have 6 and you should be alright

I'm sorry in my previous post, I though you mean you didn't knew how to load your previous ribbon set on the generator :s
From today for six weeks, I will sadly not have access to a computer, so I can not update this at all for a while

Loving the new Mission flag generator and hoping it grows soon as well! Would be awesome to be able to add a craft/mission name and a slogan and a few extra devices like the orbital stripe would be good too. Off the top of my head some emblems which could be added...

[*]Some sort of symbol to show a return mission (arrow curving round behind the planet?)

[*]A symbol to show a rescue mission (cross?)

[*]Symbol to show a fist landing (flag on the planet?)

Would also be good to get the rest of the craft emblems added as well... many of my missions are manned rovers, would be good to be able to use that one, same goes for the multi-part craft as I tend to favor permanent motherships for most interplanetary runs.

Also still looking forward to seeing the Grand Tour shields!
i was gunna get a copy of the source so i could adapt it into an Android application

i was gunna get a copy of the source so i could adapt it into an Android application

I was just about to ask if I could try making an Android App version!

How come when i click save signature it says : invalid file?

EDIT: Nvm it was just acting odd, its fixed now

Edited July 10, 2013 by Boamere

One question that I have about this really fantastic addon: How do we handle multiple missions on a single body? For example, I am building an outpost around Minmus that will serve as my Kethane post in the Kerbin system. This will consist of a station in orbit, a resupply/ferry capsule, a landed base, a Kethane probe in a polar orbit, and a Kethane drilling unit on the ground. It would be nice to have a ribbon for each active mission.

Basically, it would be nice to include an option to include multiple ribbons for each body. Only problem that may come of this is the overall size of the ribbon bar in the vertical direction ...

Warm Regards,

Joe
please can i have source?
is anyone else having issues with the Ribben, that when I click on the Basic Ribben, I get a screen flash and that;s it, no listing of plants or missions ;-(
Y No SSTO ELMBLEM On LAYTHE

Y No SSTO ELMBLEM On LAYTHE

SSTO can be done from any planet's surface, because it means "single stage to orbit", so it doesn't need to be a aircraft.

Could you please add a flag feature to indicate anomalies?

Could you please add a flag feature to indicate anomalies?

Already there, that would be the black dot in the lower right corner.

Already there, that would be the black dot in the lower right corner.

U know the difference between flag and ribbon?

Loving this app, I'd like to make a couple feature requests for subsequent releases!

  • Implement a hover title for the images in the forum in some standardized format (Planet, Craft, Other, Maneuvers).
  • Have the link go to a description of that single ribbon (seems like that is probably part of the plan), or at least have the link go to a user page which shows all the ribbons in a list with descriptions.

Cheers! Thanks for the great work!
Where is the option for signature? I didn't see it under Settings on the left side menu. Has it moved somewhere else?
Nope should be at Settings -> Left side Menu -> My Settings -> My Profile -> Edit Signature

Awesome the option was there when I just looked Odd, it didn't seem to be there last night

Ah well it's working now Awesome ribbon app! Thanks for putting this together, Moustachauve.

.,
Love these ribbons
